message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.SD, cs.MM, cs.LG

Reasoning: The paper discusses audio captioning and proposes an encoder-decoder model for generating semantically correct sentences. This falls under the sub-category of natural language processing (NLP), which is covered by cs.CL. Additionally, the paper focuses on car scenes and uses a manually-annotated dataset, which suggests that it may also fall under the sub-category of computer vision (cs.CV) and scene understanding (cs.SD). The use of pretrained word embeddings and the proposed sentence loss also suggest a machine learning (cs.LG) component to the paper. Finally, the paper evaluates its model using a new objective evaluation metric, which could fall under the sub-category of multimedia (cs.MM).
